item.title: My Latex Cheatsheet
item.description:
标题及基础设置 \documentclass[a4paper, zihao=-4, UTF8]{ctexart} \CTEXsetup[format={\Large fseries}]{section} 	itle{} \author{} \date{} \pagesytle{} %\setcounter{section}{-1} % section start from 0  egin{document} \maketitle \section{} \section[short title]{} \label{sec:section_with_short_title} section ef{sec:section_with_short_title} is a section with a short title. %交叉引用 \section*{} \subsection{} \subsection*{} \subsubsection{} \subsubsection*{} \paragraph{} \par \end{document} 数学符号 常用数学符号 Code Latex Code Latex  ecause $ ecause$ 	herefore $	herefore$  rac{a}{b} $ rac{a}{b}$ \dfrac{a}{b} $\dfrac{a}{b}$ \cdot $\cdot$ \cdots $\cdots$ \ldots $\ldots$ \infty $\infty$ \log $\log$ \lim $\lim$ \sin $\sin$ \cos $\cos$ ightarrow $ightarrow$ \int_{0}^{1} $\int_{0}^{1}$ \iint $\iint$ \oint $\oint$ \oiint $\oiint$ \iiint $\iiint$ \in $\in$ 
otin $
otin$  orall $ orall$ \exist $\exist$ \sqrt{a} $\sqrt{a}$ \exist $\exist$ 
eg $
eg$ \oplus $\oplus$ \sum\limits\_{i=1}^{10}: $\sum\limits_{i=1}^{10}$
